name: .WBOX File Extension
summary: Learn about .WBOX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A WBOX file is a game map used by version 0.7 and above of WorldBox, a fantasy world simulator. Players can use WBOX files to load other players' maps in their own instance of WorldBox.

content: WorldBox is a "god simulator" available for PC, Android, and iOS. When a player starts a game of WorldBox, they generate a map upon which the game is played. This map is saved as a WBOX file within the player's game save.
Players can retrieve and transfer WBOX files to share the maps they've created with other players. WBOX files are stored in save# folders located in the following directories:
iOS: var/​mobile/​Containers/​Data/​Application/​WorldBox/​Documents/​saves (accessible on only jailbroken iOS devices)
If you have multiple game saves, your saves folder will contain multiple save# folders (save1, save2, etc.).

instructions: WBOX files are not meant to be opened manually by players. To use a WBOX file with WorldBox, place the file in one of your game save folders (e.g. ~/​mkarpenko/​WorldBox/​saves/​save1). Then, load that saved game in WorldBox.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
